item.title: Easter Bread
item.description: Ingredients (2 loaves) 500g flour (or 4 1/4 cups) 100g butter (or 1/2 cup) 15g fresh yeast (or 0.5oz) 3 tablespoons sugar 2 small eggs 2,5dl milk (plus a little more to dissolve the yeast) (or 1 cup and 1 tablespoon) 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1 teaspoon fennel seeds chopped or powdered 2 boiled eggs (optional) Instructions (Time: 4 hours) Start by dissolving the yeast in a bit of warm milk.
